subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A 51-yard touchdown run by Candler Rich helped spur Yale’s comeback against Lehigh. Mike Nebrich threw for 435 yards and four touchdowns as Fordham racked up 635 yards of offense.
snippet: A 51-yard touchdown run by Candler Rich helped spur Yale’s comeback against Lehigh. Mike Nebrich threw for 435 yards and four touchdowns as Fordham racked up 635 yards of offense.
